description:
**Tool Overview**:

A method to check the version of the Microsoft Edge browser to ensure it is updated to mitigate vulnerabilities related to Chromium-based CVEs. 

**Details**:
1. Open your Microsoft Edge browser.
2. Click on the three dots (...) located on the top right-hand side of the window.
3. Select 'Help and feedback' from the dropdown menu.
4. Click on 'About Microsoft Edge' to view the version information.

This process allows users to confirm that they are running the latest version of Microsoft Edge that addresses vulnerabilities such as CVE-2024-0518.
